short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get insights about your opponent's openings, move times, and more on Chess.com and Lichess.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your chess game on chess.com and lichess.org with our feature-packed extension delivering deep opponent insights! Replace that ad-sidebar with a sleek dashboard showcasing vital stats like win/loss records, move-time distributions, and detailed game outcomes—checkmate, resignation, or stalemate. Analyze past game openings to anticipate your opponent’s moves and leverage the note-taking feature to track their unique tendencies. Plus, explore puzzle ratings, historical ELO trends, and winning streaks for a comprehensive performance profile. Open-source and community-driven, our extension integrates seamlessly with both chess.com and lichess.org to give you the competitive edge you’ve been searching for!
